item.title: How to Know Worth of Something
item.description: Why something is there? Thinking about why something exist, what is need of that thing gives great insights into why something is needed. What would happen if somethign is there? This question tells about importance of that thing. What role does it play. Human nature is like it doesn’t know value of something until it is not there.
